channel.title: Super bluetooth
channel.description: whats super bluetooth? some guy hacked my mobile using super bluetooth and waisted all my credit 1 question how do i make it so he cant access my phone anymore? thanks

item.title: Super bluetooth
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

People use PDA’s/laptops in crowded places to access your phone and ring their premium numbers (you can set these up for about £50 and charge over £1.50 a minute.

How to protect yourself? Turn off Bluetooth unless you need it. Plus you save battery.

Read full topic

item.title: Super bluetooth
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

I don’t know what ‘super bluetooth’ is but I am aware of some of the bluetooth headsets having vulnerabilities within them which hackers can exploit to gain access to your phone. This is usually done with a scanner that scans for the signal of the bluetooth headset which is done via a laptop computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Super bluetooth

item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Search on google for bluebugger, it’s a program to hack phones with.
